meanings.sent1: The company recharters the boat for another fishing trip.
meanings.sent2: She recharters her apartment every year to continue living there.
meanings.sent3: The school recharters the bus for a field trip, but the bus driver gets lost!
meanings.sent4: His passion for sailing recharters his spirit with a sense of freedom.
meanings.sent5: The idea of recharters brings a fresh start to the journey ahead.

meanings.sent1: The recharters of the boats were necessary to extend the fishing season.
meanings.sent2: The recharters of the apartments were processed smoothly by the leasing office.
meanings.sent3: The recharters of the buses caused confusion among the students waiting for the field trip.
meanings.sent4: The recharters of the planes symbolize the airline's commitment to customer satisfaction.
meanings.sent5: The recharters of the ships marked a new chapter in maritime history.
